original_text: and Judah the father of Perez and Zerah by Tamar, and Perez the father of Hezron, and Hezron the father of Ram,
korean_text: 유다는 다말에게서 베레스와 세라를 낳고 베레스는 헤스론을 낳고 헤스론은 람을 낳고

sentences.original_text: and Judah the father of Perez and Zerah by Tamar
and Perez the father of Hezron
and Hezron the father of Ram
